Detailed Description

Manages the image panel. Also provides image printing.

int opensonata.dataDisplays.WaterfallDisplay.ImagePanel.print ( Graphics  g,
PageFormat  pageFormat,
int  pageIndex 
) throws PrinterException

Prints the image.

Parameters:
g the Graphics instance for drawing.
pageFormat the format of the page.
pageIndex the index of the page. Only a value of 1 is acceptable.
Returns:
Printable.PAGE_EXISTS if this is a valid page and it was printed. otherwise Printable.NO_SUCH_PAGE is returned.
Exceptions:
PrinterException
